description.para: Obtains reference points to CMonitor object class smart pointer.

return.para: Returns reference points to CMonitor object class smart pointer. This return value is the reference of CMonitorRef type.

remarks.para: In user defined CAR files, if and only if monitor attribute then the user can directly invoke MyCMonitorPart function in cpp files. User can invoke method in CMonitor class by using MyCMonitorPart function return value.

system.system_name: Windows 2000 or later; Elastos 2.0 or later.
